title: Dark angel
creator_credit: Robert Iscove, Elisa Kohn Taub, Big Ticket Television and Spelling Entertainment
brief_description: In this made-for-television action thriller, a homicide detective who has been transferred from the Baton Rouge police department to New Orleans under mysterious circumstances is linked to a serial killer who preys on adulterous women. His new superiors assign a female detective to investigate him forcing him to confront his past in order to prove himself innocent before more women are killed. Cast includes Eric Roberts, Ashley Crow, Gina Torres, Linden Ashby.
